verses.verse: Now after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> it came to pass, that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Who shall go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for us against the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> first <S%H8462><s%>, to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against them?

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: behold, I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, Come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with me into my lot <S%H1486><s%>, that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>; and I likewise will go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thee into thy lot <S%H1486><s%>. So SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and the YY <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> into their hand <S%H3027><s%>: and they slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of them in Bezek <S%H966><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

And they found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Adonibezek <S%H137><s%> in Bezek <S%H966><s%>: and they fought <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against him, and they slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>.

But Adonibezek <S%H137><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, and caught <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and cut off <S%H7112><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his thumbs <S%H931><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and his great toes <S%H7272><s%>.

And Adonibezek <S%H137><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>, having their thumbs <S%H931><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and their great toes <S%H7272><s%> cut off <S%H7112><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, gathered <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8764><s%> their meat under my table <S%H7979><s%>: as I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, so 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath requited <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me. And they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and there he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> had fought <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and had taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and set <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and in the south <S%H5045><s%>, and in the valley <S%H8219><s%>.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Hevron <S%H2275><s%>: (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hevron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kiryat-Arba <S%H7153><s%>:) and they slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Sheshai <S%H8344><s%>, and Ahiman <S%H289><s%>, and Talmai <S%H8526><s%>.

And from thence he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%>: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kirjathsepher <S%H7158><s%>:

And Kalev <S%H3612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, He that smiteth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Kirjathsepher <S%H7158><s%>, and taketh <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, to him will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Achsah <S%H5915><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And `Otni'el <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>, Kalev's <S%H3612><s%> younger <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>, took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: and he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And it came to pass, when she came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to him, that she moved <S%H5496><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%> a field <S%H7704><s%>: and she lighted <S%H6795><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from off her ass <S%H2543><s%>; and Kalev <S%H3612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, What wilt thou?

And she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>: for thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me a south <S%H5045><s%> land <S%H776><s%>; give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>. And Kalev <S%H3612><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the nether <S%H8482><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>, Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> ' father in Torah <S%H2859><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm trees <S%H8558><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H5899><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, which lieth in the south <S%H5045><s%> of Arad <S%H6166><s%>; and they went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H854><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and they slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> that inhabited <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Zephath <S%H6857><s%>, and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it. And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Hormah <S%H2767><s%>.

Also Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> with the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof, and Askelon <S%H831><s%> with the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof, and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> with the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> was with Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>; and he drave out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the inhabitants of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>; but could not <S%H3808><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>, because they had chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Hevron <S%H2275><s%> unto Kalev <S%H3612><s%>, as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: and he expelled <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thence the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> did not drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the Y'vusis <S%H2983><s%> that inhabited <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; but the Y'vusis <S%H2983><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, they also went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>: and the YY <S%H3068><s%> was with them.

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> sent to descry <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>. (Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Luz <S%H3870><s%>.)

And the spies <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8685><s%> us, we pray thee, the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, and we will shew <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee mercy <S%H2617><s%>.

And when he shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; but they let go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> and all his family <S%H4940><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof Luz <S%H3870><s%>: which is the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Neither did M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the inhabitants of Bethshean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>: but the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> <S%H8686><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> was strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that they put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> to tribute <S%H4522><s%>, and did not utterly <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

Neither did Efrayim <S%H669><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%>; but the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them.

Neither did Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Kitron <S%H7003><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Nahalol <S%H5096><s%>; but the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them, and became tributaries <S%H4522><s%>.

Neither did Asher <S%H836><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Accho <S%H5910><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Zidon <S%H6721><s%>, nor of Ahlab <S%H303><s%>, nor of Achzib <S%H392><s%>, nor of Helbah <S%H2462><s%>, nor of Aphik <S%H663><s%>, nor of Rehob <S%H7340><s%>:

But the Asherites <S%H843><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: for they did not drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

Neither did Naftali <S%H5321><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Bethshemesh <S%H1053><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Bethanath <S%H1043><s%>; but he dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: nevertheless the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Bethshemesh <S%H1053><s%> and of Bethanath <S%H1043><s%> became tributaries <S%H4522><s%> unto them.

And the Amorites <S%H567><s%> forced <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>: for they would not suffer <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them to come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the valley <S%H6010><s%>:

But the Amorites <S%H567><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> <S%H8686><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Heres <S%H2776><s%> in Aijalon <S%H357><s%>, and in Shaalbim <S%H8169><s%>: yet the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> prevailed <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so that they became tributaries <S%H4522><s%>.
And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> was from the going up <S%H4608><s%> to Akrabbim <S%H4610><s%>, from the rock <S%H5553><s%>, and upward <S%H4605><s%>.
